columns.Course_ID: Identifier for the specific course being taught.
columns.Teacher_ID: Identifier for the teacher assigned to the course.
columns.Grade: Represents the grade level associated with the course.

course_arrange.table_description: The course_arrange table captures the relationship between courses, teachers, and the corresponding grade levels, ensuring the organization of teaching assignments.

columns.Teacher_ID: A unique identifier for each teacher in the table.
columns.Name: The full name of the teacher.
columns.Age: The age of the teacher at the time of record.
columns.Hometown: The hometown of the teacher, indicating their place of origin.

teacher.table_description: This table contains information about teachers, including their unique IDs, names, ages, and hometowns.

columns.Course_ID: A unique identifier for each course offered.
columns.Staring_Date: The date on which the course begins.
columns.Course: The name or title of the course.

course.table_description: The course table contains essential information regarding the courses offered, including unique identifiers, starting dates, and course names.
